name: Reflect (pre-alpha)
description:
An Android game by ValiantShape where you reflect light onto a goal.

!This game is very early in development, and there are many bugs!

Use reflectors (lines) to reflect the light ray into the goal (circle)

Move reflectors by dragging, and rotate them with two fingers, it will face the direction of your finger (Yes, we know that this system is highly flawed, and we are working on a fix currently!)

Try to enjoy!
